thread.title: Atletico Madrid manager Diego Simeone spotted smashing out pull-ups in a Madrid park
thread.title_full: Atletico Madrid manager Diego Simeone spotted smashing out pull-ups in a Madrid park

author: Mark Jones
title: Atletico Madrid manager Diego Simeone spotted smashing out pull-ups in a Madrid park
text:
Get Arsenal FC     
We can't imagine that Sam Allardyce is spending his international break like this. 
Atletico Madrid manager Diego Simeone - who remains one of the most in-demand bosses in the European game - has been spotted out and about while his players are all away with their countries, but he's certainly not been taking it easy. 
Simeone - who is famed for his fearsome demeanour on the touchline, and has been linked with replacing Arsene Wenger at Arsenal in the past - and he certainly looks to be up for the fight if the video above is anything to go by. LOUD NOISES! (Photo: Matthias Hangst) We wouldn't like to cross him... (Photo: Denis Doyle) 
It shows the Argentinean putting us mere mortals to shame by smashing out some pull-ups in a Madrid park, where he was spotted by a passer-by. 
Clearly a man who takes his fitness seriously, the 46-year-old looks like someone half his age as he effortlessly keeps in shape ahead of Atletico's return to La Liga action at Malaga on Saturday night. 
On this evidence, if he did end up at Arsenal then a few Gunners players could be in a shock. poll loading Is Diego Simeone the scariest manager in world football? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
